sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都含有"解释"或"说明"之意。
means: explanation ： 普通用词，指使人明白未知或不清楚的事。
definition ： 主要指对某一词、短语或专门术语的含义作解释、下定义。
description ： 指对某一事物的重要方面进行详细叙述，常含教育与启迪意味。
exposition ： 通常指对论点、假设、理论等的重点作详尽的阐述。
interpretation ： 多指对文字上较难的段落，或难于理解，令人迷惑的问题作出解释或说明。

word_mean: 界定，定义：对事物界限的清楚确定

sentence.Network_en: It all depends on your definition of punk, doesn'tit?
sentence.Network_cn: “这全视乎你对朋克摇滚乐的定义，不是吗？”

sentence.Network_en: The legal definition of "know" often presumes mental control.
sentence.Network_cn: “知晓”的法律定义通常假定存在思维控制能力。

sentence.Network_en: Give your brows extra definition with Outdoor Girl'sEyebrow Pencil in Brown.
sentence.Network_cn: 用“户外女孩”品牌的棕色眉笔更加清晰地勾勒出眉形。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 脑胶质瘤门诊_天涯医院_天涯论坛 ... 6. Memory loss 记忆丧失 Definition 定义 Brain Tumor 脑肿瘤.
电影词汇（中英文对照） ... de luxe color 特丽七彩 definition 清晰度 defocus transition 出焦转场.
大学英语四级单词集锦 D 开头_百度文库 ... definitely ad. 一定地，明确地 definition n. 定义，释义；定界 degree n. 程度；度；学位.
雅思AWL词汇辨析 - 豆丁网 ... datum 的复数 definition n. 定义, 解说解析：【衍】 define 定义.

list.abs: 新视野大学英语1-4册单词表 - 豆丁网 ... weird a. 古怪的;离奇的 definitely ad. 当然;无疑地 youngster n. 青少年; 青年.
新概念英语第二册单词总汇_英语网 ... return n.,vt.,vi. 报答，返回 definitely ad. 一定，肯定地 reveal vt. 揭露，显示，泄露.
大英语B级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... define vt. 定义 definite adj. 明确的 definition n. 定义.
明字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 明渠〖 openditch〗 明确〖 categorical;definite;clear-cut〗 明确〖 pinpoint〗.

lj.lj_ly: it is by definition a complex object.
lj.lj_ls: 它本质上是个复杂的物体。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin definitio(n-), from the verb definire 'set bounds to' (see define)

entry.tran: (尤指词典中给出的)定义，释义
entry.def: A definition is a statement giving the meaning of a word or expression, especially in a dictionary.

example.ex: There is no general agreement on a standard definition of intelligence...
example.tran: “智力”一词目前还没有一个普遍认可的标准释义。

example.ex: My definition of a good hospice is one where some of the patients start feeling too good to die.
example.tran: 我对“好的晚期病人安养院”的定义是一个能让一些病人开始感到生有所恋的地方。

entry.def: Definition is the quality of being clear and distinct.

example.ex: Give your brows extra definition with Outdoor Girl's Eyebrow Pencil in Brown...
example.tran: 用“户外女孩”品牌的棕色眉笔更加清晰地勾勒出眉形。

example.ex: The speakers criticised his new programme for lack of definition.
example.tran: 几位发言者批评他的新方案不够清楚明确。

means.word_mean: 1. a concise explanation of the meaning of a word or phrase or symbol

sentences.sentence: "exercise had give his muscles superior definition"

auth_sentence.content: This is the definition of a type II supernova.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is the definition of a type II supernova.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is the definition of a type II supernova.

auth_sentence.content: Islam by its very definition means "peace".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Islam by its very definition means "peace".

auth_sentence.content: Clarification of the geophysical definition of a gravity field.
auth_sentence.res_content: Clarification of the geophysical definition of a gravity field.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Clarification of the geophysical definition of a gravity field.

stems_affixes.type_exp: =limit,boundary,end 表示"结束,范围,界限,限制"

stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+fin界限+ite……的→adj.明确的, 一定的
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+al……的→adj.最后的,最终的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ite……的→adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
af一再+fin界限+ity表名词→进入范围内→密切关系

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定义,解释;[轮廓影像等的]清晰度;阐明

fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ale表示音乐类→终曲
final最后的+ist人→n.参加决赛者
final[adj.最后的,最终的]+ity表名词→n.结尾,定局,终结
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+itude状态→n.有限
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ity表名词→n.有限, 限定
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
infinite[adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限]+itude状态→infinitude无限,无穷数
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去"等; 2. 表示"使……成为,加强"等

stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+struct结构+ion表名词→弄坏结构→破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定义,解释;[轮廓影像等的]清晰度;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: de使……成为,加强+fin界限+ition表名词→划出界限→定义
de使……成为+sign标志→使……成为标志→设计
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+celer速度+ate表动词→使速度变慢
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+code密码→去掉密码
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+fame名声→名声变坏→诽谤
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+forest森林→去掉森林
de去掉+lete→v.删除;擦掉
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+mobilize动员→反过来动员→复员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 剥夺……的国籍;解除国有化
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+nationalize国有化→v. 剥夺……的国籍;解除国有化
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+press压→向下压→压制
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+salt盐→去掉盐分
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+throne皇冠→去掉皇冠→退位
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+train火车→v.下火车
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+value价值→去掉价值
de使……成为,加强+limit限定→加强限定
de使……成为,加强+line线条+ate表动词→划线条→描画[轮廓]
de使……成为,加强+nude裸体的→成为裸体
de使……成为,加强+pict描画→成为画图→描绘
de使……成为,加强+sicc干+ate表动词→弄干
de使……成为+sign标志→使……成为标志→设计

Sentence.sentence: Broader definitions of the sharing economy include peer-to-peer lending or putting a solar panel on your roof and selling power back to the gr/d ( 电网)
This is the definition of integration.
Einstein used a definition of time for experimental purposes, as that which is measured by a clock.
the definition of unemployment is too broad
On the other hand, rejection occurs when others treat you in a manner that is inconsistent with yourself definition.

means.word_mean: 定义, 释义;（尤指词典里的词或短语的）释义, 解释

sentences.en: I made a definition for this word.
They concentrated on better definition of the optical image.
sentences.cn: 他们致力于提高该光学影像的清晰度。

sentences.en: The book attempts a definition of his role in world politics.
sentences.cn: 该书要阐明的是他在世界政局中的作用。

jushi.english: The club must give a clear definition of its goals.
jushi.chinese: 俱乐部必须明确说明它的宗旨。

jushi.english: I made a definition for this word.
